cause.description:
America is the best country and no matter your political stance,religeous beliefs, race, etc you are accepted, and no the goverment is not perfect but think about it, no government is, so think about how good we have it before you bash the country you live in and grew up in, and SUPPORT THE TROOPS!!
1. Pro-America
2. Be patriotic
3. Support Troops
cause.name: America Rocks
